summary: Hey!! my 2nd attempt at an enb :) this time tweaked around vanilla weathers and lighting :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][b][size=3]WHY DONT YOU CHECK OUT MY FALLOUT 4 RESHADE WHILE YOUR HERE? :) LOL
http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/1167/

I HAVE STAYED UP UNTIL 5AM FOR NUMEROUS DAYS DOING THIS,  HOPE YOU ALL ENJOY IT! :)

FEEL FREE TO ENDORSE IF YOU THINK ITS GOOD ;)

COMMENTS AND FEEDBACK ARE ENCOURAGED, I WOULD LIKE TO GET BETTER AT DOING THIS :)


SERENDIPITY ENB :)
((n)the chance occurrence of events in a beneficial way)

FOR ENB VERSION 279!! :)

HEY!, I wanted to make an enb based around vanilla weathers/lighting, so it could be usable by more people :)

I haven't tried it with any lighting/weather/water mods, but im PRETTY sure it would work just fine with them :)[/size]

[img]http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b429/nrngreen/TESV%202015-10-22%2003-22-08-396_zpsvwhfipnt.jpg[/img]

[size=5]FEATURES:
[/size]
[size=3]-BLOOM
-DETAILED SHADOWS
-TWEAKED BOKEH DOF
-BEAUTIFUL SUNRISES/SUNSETS
-SUNGLARE
-GODRAYS
-DAM GOOD PERFORMANCE!! (I HATE STUTTERING,SERIOUSELY, I HATE IT LOL:) )
& MORE!!!!! :)

As I mentioned at the top of the page, there are no lighting/weather or water mods necessary for this enb(there are the usual requirements shown at bottom of page), BUT dont worry, i think i did a pretty dam good job simulating the effects of lights and such(check the screenshots)

OR AT LEAST I HOPE I DID :) LOL[/size]

[img]http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b429/nrngreen/TESV%202015-10-22%2003-14-05-136_zpsywlmirzj.jpg[/img]

[size=3]REQUIREMENTS:

bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1

and dont forget to edit the enblocal.ini to your pc specs :)

AND,

BE NICE AND DONT HATE ON THIS ENB, ITS ONLY MY SECOND TRY LOL :)

SPECIAL THANKS/CREDITS

MATSO-BOKEH DOF 
PHINIX- SUN SPRITE SHADER
BORIS-FOR EVERYTHING ENB
& THE NEXUS COMMUNITY FOR BEING AWESOME !! :)[/size]
[/b][/font][/center]
author: Bandit1232
